verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: to Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday night] [ARGM-PRP: to attack Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] , [ARGM-PRD: claiming that he acted “ meek and mild ” during their meetings at the weekend 's Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit] .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] took to Twitter on Saturday night to [V: attack] [ARG1: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] , claiming that he acted “ meek and mild ” during their meetings at the weekend 's Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit .

Donald Trump took to Twitter on Saturday night to attack Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau , claiming that [ARG0: he] [V: acted] [ARG1: “ meek and mild ”] [ARGM-TMP: during their meetings at the weekend 's Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit] .
